name: Flappy TimberBird - The Adventure of a Tiny Timberman Bird
name_original: Flappy TimberBird - The Adventure of a Tiny Timberman Bird
description:
[How to play]
- Control your flappy TimberBird like a real timberman
- Hit the pipe while keep flying
- Avoid the pipe unions

It's really simple, isn't it? Yes it is, but be careful because it could be a hard challenge to master!

Improve your skills and try to reach the top on the ranking.
